news.title: Ford has an AI assistant and new hands-free BlueCruise tech on the way
news.summary: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.

news.title: Discord and Mercor investor Niko Bonatsos departs General Catalyst, plans new VC firm
news.summary: Bonatsos spent 15 years at GC, and until last year led the firm's seed investing strategy.

news.title: Larry Page loosens business ties to CA amid state’s proposed wealth tax, report
news.summary: Larry Page is reportedly moving assets out of California over concern the state will vote in a tax on billionaires.

news.title: Yes, LinkedIn banned AI agent startup Artisan, but now it’s back
news.summary: Several viral posts noticed that Artisan was banned. But the CEO tells us it wasn't for the reasons many thought.

news.title: Roku’s $3 streaming service Howdy will be coming to other platforms, CEO says
news.summary: At CES 2026, Anthony Wood, Roku's founder, chairman, and CEO, offered a hint about the future of the company's newest streaming channel, Howdy, and its ambition to become a broader competitor in the market.

news.title: Disney Plus is getting vertical video
news.summary: Disney Plus will be getting a vertical video feed later this year, Disney announced as part of its Global Tech & Data Showcase for advertisers at CES, Deadline reports. news.title: Ford’s AI voice assistant is coming later this year, L3 driving in 2028
news.summary: Ford's new AI-powered voice assistant will be rolling out to customers later this year, the company's top software executive said at CES today. And in 2028, the automaker will introduce a hands-free, eyes-off Level 3 autonomous driving feature as part of its more affordable (and hopefully more profi

news.title: Chase is taking over Apple’s credit card
news.summary: On Wednesday evening, Apple announced that JPMorgan Chase will become the new issuer of Apple Card, replacing Goldman Sachs, which has backed the company's credit cards since their launch in 2019. This ends speculation about a new partner for Apple Card stretching back a few years, as Goldman Sachs

news.title: Blood for stonks
news.summary: On December 31st, a brand-new account on Polymarket placed a bet: Nicolás Maduro, the leader of Venezuela, would be out of office by the end of January. news.title: Bluetti now charges power stations at up to 1200W in your car
news.summary: Bluetti's latest car charger can quickly charge power stations at a very fast 1200W - about 10 times faster than plugging it into the 12V cigarette lighter outlet. news.title: Samsung’s Ballie home robot, once promised for summer 2025, gets grim update
news.summary: Six years after its CES debut, Samsung has demoted Ballie to internal use.

news.title: AI starts autonomously writing prescription refills in Utah
news.summary: The program allows patients in the state to get prescription refills for 190 common meds.

news.title: Warner Bros. sticks with Netflix merger, calls Paramount’s $108B bid “illusory”
news.summary: Larry Ellison pledged $40B, but "he didn’t raise the price," Warner chair says.

news.title: Bose open-sources its SoundTouch home theater smart speakers ahead of end-of-life
news.summary: If companies insist on bricking gadgets, this is a better way to do it.

news.title: Expired certificate completely breaks macOS Logitech apps, user customizations
news.summary: Even with a fix available, broken apps won't be able to update themselves.

news.title: Traces of Leonardo da Vinci's DNA May Have Been Discovered on a Red Chalk Drawing Called 'Holy Child'
news.summary: Researchers suggest that they have recovered sequences from ancient works and letters that may belong to the Renaissance genius.

news.title: The Apple AirPods Pro 3 Are $50 Off
news.summary: Snag a relatively rare discount on Apple’s finest earbuds at Best Buy.

news.title: Grok Is Generating Sexual Content Far More Graphic Than What's on X
news.summary: A WIRED review of outputs hosted on Grok’s official website shows it’s being used to create violent sexual images and videos, as well as content that includes apparent minors.

news.title: Election Deniers Think the Venezuela Attack Is All About 2020
news.summary: Conspiracy theorists claim the capture of Venezuelan president Nicolás Maduro is proof that the Venezuelan government rigged the 2020 election in Joe Biden’s favor.

news.title: What’s Going on With Smart Rings?
news.summary: Ultrahuman smart rings currently can’t be sold in the US. We caught up with the company’s chief business officer to discuss what’s next for ring-based health tracking.
